comments: This Professor is a rare breed. he will make a course fun. he is there to help you when you need help. his teaching style is different than most and can take a little bit to get used to but you will not forget the points he try\'s to teach. if you pay attention you will pass if you actually take time in this course you will get an A!
Best professor at ASU. Although attendance is not mandatory you will need the info from lectures for the test.
Ok class, need to pay attn in class to do well on the tests. Makes lectures interesting but thinks he is funnier than he actually is
after 3 years of college, i actually had a class that i enjoyed!

Seperich is one of those teachers you get which changes how you feel about the education system. He truly is an excellent teacher, and despite the fact that the class he teaches, an introductory agribusiness class, could potentially be a sleeper, he turns the class into something exciting and dynamic. Keep it up Sep!!
Easy, just show up to class and listen
Sep is hilarious! If you get a chance to take his class, go for it. He\'s fun to talk to, cares about students, and just generally is a blast.

best teacher ive had in college by far. he is funny, everything is a joke for him, gives very little homework and his exams are just on material covered in class. the grade for the class is determined by 4 exams and he drops the lowest score. great teacher highly recommended
